plot: Two college students meet up but things quickly turn sideways when the boy, Damien, cheats on Eve. Soon Eve gets involved with some people in the narcotics trade but things go out of control when Damien tries to take her back.
title: Purity Lost
plot_es: Two college students meet up but things quickly turn sideways when the boy, Damien, cheats on Eve. Soon Eve gets involved with some people in the narcotics trade but things go out of control when Damien tries to take her back.
plot_en: Two college students meet up but things quickly turn sideways when the boy, Damien, cheats on Eve. Soon Eve gets involved with some people in the narcotics trade but things go out of control when Damien tries to take her back.
